revised_title: Experiments on Mixing Gold with Tin: Debunking the Myth of Tin's Brittleness
tldr: The author, Stanesby Alchorne, conducts a series of experiments to determine the effects of mixing gold with tin. Contrary to popular belief, he finds that tin does not significantly impact the ductility or brittleness of gold when mixed in small quantities. This challenges the widely held opinion among metallurgists and chemical writers.
